attributes.action: Reverse the smoking ban for pubs in residential areas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The smoking ban has forced smokers on to the street were they generate high levels of noise, create an obstacle for pedestrians forcing them to walk in the road and feel intimidated by their drunkeness,there is no better advertisement for smoking than its new exposure on every street, it has become more exposed to children as it was previously hidden within the pubs. KEEP SMOKING IN PUBS NOT OUR PUBLIC STREETS

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
